name: Dark Octillery
author: Shin-ichi Yoshida
flavor_text: It likes to sleep in rock caves and will even steal other Octillery’s nests.

attacks.name: Ink Blast
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Dark Octillery but not used to pay for this attack’s Energy cost. You can’t add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Tentacle Wrap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, during your opponent’s next turn, your opponent pays {C} more to retreat the Defending Pokémon.
